Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-24809 affecting package memcached for versions less than 1.6.27-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-24809 affecting package memcached for versions less than 1.6.27-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package memcached is earlier than 1.6.27-4, affected by CVE-2026-24809
